brief_description: SportsSphere is a premium sports shop platform with Firebase authentication and a dynamic database. Users can add sports equipment, view listings directly from the database, and access their own added items. It features a price-based sorting system for easy browsing, ensuring a seamless shopping experience.
challenges_faced: Implementing real-time data updates for equipment listings and optimizing the sorting system for large datasets.
potential_improvements: Adding a wishlist feature, integrating payment options, and enhancing the UI with animations for a more engaging user experience.
